channel.title: Carole Wilkinson on Transcripts of Iriss.fm
channel.description: Recent content in Carole Wilkinson on Transcripts of Iriss.fm

item.title: How to encourage innovation in the regulated environment
item.description: CW - Carole Wilkinson CW Good morning everybody. It’s very nice to see some familiar faces and some old friends here this morning. I was reflecting as I was coming here that this is probably quite a good piece of timing in terms of thinking about risk and regulation in the light of what has been happening in the airline and aviation industry in the last few days (Icelandic volcano eruption) and we might want to see what we can learn from that as we go through this.
